word: We read that the devil believed and trembled, but that faith did not save him. We want that faith that has the Bible foundation for it\97that faith that grasps a living Saviour and a living God. . . . The blood of Christ alone can cleanse the sinner from every stain of sin. Had they acknowledged that law, it would have pointed out to them in the old world what sin was, and they would not have dared to sin. . . .
